metadata.documentation: Freely available
Transmitted through Unidata Internet Data Distribution.
Read by CDM Forecast Model Run Collection.

documentation.xlink:title: NCEP/NWS Model Analyses and Forecasts Page

creator.name: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)/National Weather Service (NWS) National Center for Environmental Prediction (NCEP)

metadata.documentation: NCEP Global Forecast System Model, previously called AVN/MRF (Medium Range Forecast)

documentation.xlink:title: COMET MetEd (Meteorology Education and Training) documentation

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 230 (G) Grid. Global Lat/Lon grid. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours from 96 to 180 hours (4 to 7.5 days). Horizontal= 361 by 720 points, resolution 0.5 degree, Lat/Lon projection. Vertical= 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 229 (F) Grid. Global Lat/Lon grid. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 180 hours (7.5 days). Horizontal = 181 by 360 points, resolution 1 degree, Lat/Lon projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 228 (A) Grid. Global Lat/Lon grid. Model runs are made at every 12 hours from 192 to 384 hours (8 to 16 days). Horizontal= 73 by 144 points, resolution 2.5 degree, Lat/Lon projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : AWIPS 201 (A) Grid. Northern Hemisphere (polar stereographic). Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 6 hours out 10 days. Horizontal = 65 by 65 points, resolution 381.0 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (10 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : Mercator Grid. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 6 hours out 10 days. Horizontal = 300 by 369 points, resolution 40 km, Mercator projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (29 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP GFS Model : Puerto_Rico 0.5 degree Lat/Lon grid. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, 18 hours out to 10 days. Horizontal = 102 by 107 points, resolution .5 degree, Lat/Lon projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa mandatory pressure levels (29 levels); surface, height above ground, pressure layers.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Nonhydrostatic Mesoscale Model (NMM) and Gridpoint Statistical Interpolation (GSI) analysis, running in the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) infrastructure.

documentation.xlink:title: COMET MetEd (Meteorology Education and Training) documentation

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model: AWIPS 242 (S) Grid over Alaska. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, 18Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours (3.5 days). Horizontal = 553 by 425 points, resolution 11.25 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa pressure levels.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 216 (V) grid over Alaska. Model runs are made at 00Z, 06Z, 12Z, and 18Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours (3.5 days). Horizontal = 139 by 107 points, resolution 45.0 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 50 hPa pressure levels.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 218 (B) grid over the continental United States. Model runs are made at 06Z, 12Z, 18Z and 00Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours (3.5 days). Horizontal = 614 by 428 points, resolution 12.19 km, LambertConformal projection. Vertical = 1000 to 100 hPa pressure levels (29).

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 218 (B) grid over the continental United States. Model runs are made at 06Z, 12Z, 18Z and 00Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours (3.5 days). Horizontal = 614 by 428 points, resolution 12.19 km, LambertConformal projection. Vertical = small number of mandatory pressure levels, lots of surface fields.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 215(U) grid over the continental United States - Quadruple Resolution. Horizontal = 369 by 257 points, resolution 20.31 km, LambertConformal projection. Model runs are made at 00Z, 06Z, 12Z, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours. Vertical = surface, height above ground, layers, and 1000 to 150 hPa pressure levels.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 215(U) grid over the continental United States - Quadruple Resolution. Horizontal = 369 by 257 points, resolution 20.31 km, LambertConformal projection. Model runs are made at 00Z, and 12Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours; and at 06Z, and 18Z with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 48 hours. Vertical = surface, 2m, and 10m, 2D fields only.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 212 (R) Regional - CONUS - Double Resolution. Horizontal = 185 by 129 points, resolution 40.63 km; LambertConformal projection. Vertical = surface, 1000 to 50 hPa pressure levels, layers, and depth. Model runs are made at 00Z, 06Z, 12Z, and 18Z and have analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP North American Model : AWIPS 105 Grid. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, and 18Z, with analysis and forecasts every 3 hours out to 84 hours. Horizontal = 147 by 110 points, resolution 90.75 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Vertical = 1000 to 50 hPa pressure levels.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Rapid Update Cycle (RUC) Model: frequently updated short-range weather forecasts.

documentation.xlink:title: COMET MetEd (Meteorology Education and Training) documentation

metadata.documentation: NCEP Model output Rapid Update Cycle (RUC2). Model runs are made hourly, with analysis and hourly forecasts out to 12 hours; on the 0, 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, and 21Z runs. The other forecast are out to 9 hours. Horizontal = 337 by 451 points, resolution 13.55 km, LambertConformal projection.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Rapid Update Cycle 2 (RUC2) Surface parameters. Horizontal = 301 by 225 points, resolution 20.31 km, Lambert Conformal projection. Model runs are made hourly, with analysis and hourly forecasts out to 3 hours; on the 0, 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, and 21Z runs, also 5, 6, 8, 9, 11, 12 hour forecasts.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Rapid Update Cycle 2 (RUC2) Parameters on pressure levels. Horizontal = 301 by 225 points, resolution 20.31 km, Lambert Conformal projection. Model runs are made hourly, with analysis and hourly forecasts out to 9 hours; on the 0, 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, and 21Z runs, hourly out to 12 hours.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Rapid Update Cycle 2 (RUC2) Parameters on hybrid levels. Horizontal = 301 by 225 points, resolution 20.31 km, Lambert Conformal projection. Model runs are made hourly, with analysis and hourly forecasts out to 3 hours; on the 0, 3, 6, 9, 12, 15, 18, and 21Z runs, also 6, 9, and 12 hour forecasts.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: The NCEP DGEX Model is the Eta model extended to 8 days over smaller domains using the operational Eta model 78 hour forecast and GFS boundary conditions.

documentation.xlink:title: COMET MetEd (Meteorology Education and Training) documentation

metadata.documentation: NCEP Model output Grid 185 (C) horizontal = 491 by 303 points, resolution 12 km, LambertConformal projection. Model runs are made at 6 and 18Z, with forecasts starting at 84 hours, every 6 hours out to 192 hours

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Model output AWIPS Grid 186 (C) horizontal = 377 by 237 points, resolution 12 km, Polar Stereographic projection. Model runs are made at 0 and 12Z, with forecasts starting at 84 hours, every 6 hours out to 192 hours

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Global Ensemble Forecasting System (GEFS) Global one degree Lat/Lon grid. Model runs are made at 0, 6, 12, 18 ... hours out to 378 hours (16 days). Horizontal = 181 by 360 points, resolution 1 degree, Lat/Lon projection. Vertical = 2000 to 1000 hPa mandatory pressure levels (7 levels); pressure, height above ground, pressure_difference_layers.
Derived Products: mean, spread, and probability products.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: Ensemble members.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: The NCEP RTMA Model is Real Time Mesoscale Analysis models.
NCEP Model horizontal = 1377 by 2145 points, resolution 2.5 km, LambertConformal projection. Model runs are made hourly, with 0 hour forecast

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Model horizontal = 193 by 193 points, resolution 2.5 km, Mercator projection. Model runs are made every 3 hours at 0, 3, ... with 0 hour forecasts.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Short Range Ensemble Forecast (SREF)

NCEP Short Range Ensemble Forecast (SREF) 40km derived products: mean, spread, and probability. over CONUS with 185 by 129 points, resolution 40 km. Models are run daily at 3,9,15,and 21Z. Forecasts every 3 hours from 3 to 87 hours.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Short Range Ensemble Forecast (SREF) 40km derived products: bias-corrected mean, spread, and probability. over CONUS with 185 by 129 points, resolution 40 km. Models are run daily at 3,9,15,and 21Z. Forecasts every 3 hours from 3 to 87 hours.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP Short Range Ensemble Forecast (SREF) 40km derived products: bias-corrected ensemble members. over CONUS with 185 by 129 points, resolution 40 km. Models are run daily at 3,9,15,and 21Z. Forecasts every 3 hours from 3 to 87 hours.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP SREF Alaska 45km derived products:mean, spread, and probability.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NCEP SREF Pacific NE 0.4 degree derived products:mean, spread, and probability.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: National Digital Forecast Database (NDFD): US National Weather Service gridded forecasts of sensible weather elements.
1073 by 689 points, resolution 5 km. Results from 12Z and 18Z run. Forecasts every 6 hours from 90 to 180 hours.
1073 by 689 points, resolution 5 km. Models are run hourly. Forecasts every 3 hours from 2 to 74 hours and every 6 hours from 74 to 170.
NCEP Wave Watch III (WW3): US National Weather Service gridded forecasts of sensible weather elements.
720 by 336 points, resolution 30 minute. Models are run daily at 0Z, 6Z, 12Z and 18Z. Forecasts every 3 hours from 0 to 72, every 6 hours from 72 to 180 hours.

fmrcConfig.datasetTypes: TwoD Best Files Runs ConstantForecasts ConstantOffsets

metadata.documentation: NEXRAD Radar National Composites of Level 3 Base Reflectivity. 1 km resolution. Generated by Unidata every 5-6 minutes.
